attributes.name: Nature & Wildlife
attributes.description: Applaud the beauty of the natural world and the joy of exploration in our Nature & Wildlife community. Recommend, share, nourish. Marvel at the wonder of the natural world and help the creatures that inhabit it thrive.

attributes.name: Activism & Civil Rights
attributes.description: Activism fights injustice. It’s at the heart of radical political and social change. Check in here to meet equally motivated and passionate individuals. Unite, fight, and make your voice heard.

attributes.name: Social Sciences
attributes.description: Delve deeper into society and culture and pick the brains of hand-chosen experts. Get insights from leading academic institutions and researchers. Learn more about why we do what we do and how it affects the world around us.

attributes.name: Biodiversity & Rewilding
attributes.description: When the bees have gone, it’s all over. Each living thing on our planet, from the tiniest micro-organisms to entire ecosystems, has its part to play. Understanding begins here and it’s just the first step.

attributes.name: Physics
attributes.description: Physics explores the ever-changing fabric of our world. From subatomic substructures to gas giants, and from the complication of movement to electromagnetic circles, you get to hash out the big issues here.

attributes.name: Books & Literature
attributes.description: Honour the beauty and complexity of language. Take a deep dive into the worlds of fiction and non-fiction and celebrate the voices of exceptional writers, poets, and creators from around the world.

attributes.name: US Politics
attributes.description: Navigate the intricate landscape of US politics. Gain insights into governance, policies, and the democratic process. Your window into the heartbeat of the nation's decision-making.

attributes.name: Architecture & Design
attributes.description: "Design creates culture. Culture shapes values. Values determine the future." - Robert L. Peters. Help design the architecture of the future, and join a community of built-environment enthusiasts and designers here.

attributes.name: Indigenous Peoples
attributes.description: Indigenous communities champion biodiversity, cultural heritage, historical artefacts, and knowledge. This collection shows why indigenous communities matter and provides a platform for indigenous activists.

attributes.name: Breaking News
attributes.description: Fill your feed with breaking news from trustworthy sources around the world. Each week we'll highlight different sources in the Recommended timeline.

attributes.name: AI
attributes.description: Is AI a good thing? Or all we all redundant? If it is good, what’s next? What does the future look like? We’ve got all the AI developments right here. Stay informed among a diverse global community.

attributes.name: Academia & Research
attributes.description: Embark on a journey of academia and research. Delve into a world where knowledge knows no bounds. Explore, learn, and contribute to the pursuit of understanding.

attributes.name: Food & Drink
attributes.description: Everyone has food and drink in common, yet it highlights our uniqueness by offering an insight into history and culture. Cook up some great connections with a side of inclusivity.

attributes.name: Visual Arts
attributes.description: Artist or art lover, you’ll know that art purifies your experiences, goals, ambitions, and dreams. Bookmark this community for all things 3D art, anime illustrations, collages, oil paintings, and more.

attributes.name: History
attributes.description: ‘Those who do not learn from history are doomed to repeat it’ – George Santayana. The history community here helps us analyse the past so we can build a better future.

attributes.name: Government & Policy
attributes.description: Get straight to the heart of government. Enjoy impartial, credible, and constructive policy analysis and dive into open resources in a lively community of policymakers, activists, students, and of course - the public.

attributes.name: Journalism & Comment
attributes.description: You’re entitled to your opinion. You’re also entitled not to be subjected to fake news and misinformation. Get all the freedom of speech you need right here, without the hate and harassment.

attributes.name: Women’s Voices
attributes.description: Womanhood is power and powerlessness. However discriminated against you feel as a woman, you’ll enjoy a binding sense of community here. Celebrate womanhood through information, support, and empowerment.

attributes.name: Football
attributes.description: Newsmast is about community. There’s nothing more communal than fans coming together in the shared belief that this is your team’s time. And if not, there’s always next year.

attributes.name: Biology
attributes.description: Shared knowledge can advance healthy living. In our biology community, you can discuss how cells work, the interplay between genetics and the environment, biological ecosystems, and more.

attributes.name: Puzzles
attributes.description: Post your Wordle scores and more in a community dedicated to mental health. Puzzles keep your brain active, keep you entertained, and boost your problem-solving skills. We’re happy to support mental wellbeing.

attributes.name: Ukraine Invasion
attributes.description: Newsmast was inspired by the online community which emerged following the invasion of Ukraine. It’s designed by a Ukrainian app designer. What better place to share your news and comments.

attributes.name: Space
attributes.description: Whether you’re an accomplished astronaut, a novice astronomer, or anything in between, it’s our mission to expand your knowledge or connect you with like-minded space enthusiasts.

attributes.name: Politics
attributes.description: Today’s political issues served up at source. Get an immediacy that’s beyond the reach of mainstream media. Plus a side order of inclusivity and tolerance.

attributes.name: Markets & Finance
attributes.description: "There are no limits to what free men, free women, and free markets can accomplish” – Jack Kemp. The free market means liberty, rights, and the ability for everyone to contribute to society. Let’s collaborate to improve our knowledge of how to make money work for us and for society.

attributes.name: Technology
attributes.description: Collaboration to make a difference is the goal here. We’re not about brand promotion – just a passion for cutting-edge technology and the difference it can make to our lives.

attributes.name: Performing Arts
attributes.description: Break the Fourth Wall. We connect performing artists with the audience in a mutual celebration of music, art, dance, and drama. Join us and widen the audience.

attributes.name: Business
attributes.description: Business touches everything - so it matters, a lot. But how should business be organised so it is accountable to all its stakeholders? Whether the answer is circular, inclusive or socially responsible, join us here for good-faith discussions on the good, the bad and the different.

attributes.name: Disabled Voices
attributes.description: The world isn’t inclusive but the Newsmast community for disabled individuals is. Share experiences, discuss disability justice, and combat isolation. Promote education and advocacy and build solidarity.

attributes.name: Pets
attributes.description: Into iguanas? Fixated by fish? Or maybe you just love cats and dogs. Come back here often to connect over a mutual love of our furry, scaly and feathery friends.

attributes.name: Immigrants Rights
attributes.description: Collectively, we have a moral duty to give refugees, asylum seekers, and all other immigrants the aid to help them assimilate into a new society and lead happy, prosperous lives.

attributes.name: Creative Arts
attributes.description: Creative expression is proven to help wellbeing. Expressing yourself through drawing, painting, poetry or music is great for mindfulness. Build your skills in a community that’s chock-full of creativity.

attributes.name: Chemistry
attributes.description: Chemistry is ever-changing. It describes matter and its transformations, the science that defines molecules, nanostructures, and extended solids, and their properties, reactions and applications. Debate the issues here.

attributes.name: Sport
attributes.description: Sport is the biggest community in the world. Beyond the winning and losing, it drives change and social justice, while promoting fairness, equality, and respect across international boundaries. Get together here, celebrate what you love, and be united in your differences.

attributes.name: Democracy & Human Rights
attributes.description:
“To deny people their human rights is to challenge their very humanity” – Nelson  Mandela.

Democracy is at the heart of a fair, free society. So do we need to challenge the current political landscape? Here we can work together to promote democracy and challenge human-rights violations across the world.

attributes.name: Hunger, Disease & Water
attributes.description: A world where everyone has their basic needs met. That's the goal. But hunger, unsafe drinking water, and disease are the reality of many. Help us add to the sum of human knowledge. Report on global health, mobilise people and resources, and advance critical research.

attributes.name: Gaming
attributes.description: From haptic technology to human-computer interaction and from AI to in-game chatting, you can talk gaming here among your kind of people.

attributes.name: Humour
attributes.description: Need comic relief? Come back here for memes, belly laughs, chortles, giggles, sniggers, and coffee spurts. Keep it clean where you can.

attributes.name: Workers Rights
attributes.description: We’re here to advocate for labour rights and dignity in the workplace. Unite to improve working conditions, promote fairness, education, and make positive change for the labour movement.

attributes.name: Climate change
attributes.description: David Attenborough says the next 50 years will determine the fate of all life. That’s why we’re inspiring action against the greatest threat to humanity. Join the community and help save our planet.

attributes.name: Engineering
attributes.description: Engineering creates devices, machines, and software to solve complex problems. Robots, microprocessors, power grids, cellular networks, and artificial limbs are all the work of engineers. Let’s swap stories here.

attributes.name: Mathematics
attributes.description: Maths is everywhere. It’s in personal finances, design and engineering, scientific research, STEM, and even nature. It’s essential for developing new technologies and advancing human knowledge. Suits us fine.

attributes.name: US Sport
attributes.description: Step into the realm of US sports. Journey through iconic games, legendary athletes, and unmatched excitement. Your gateway to the heart-pounding world of American sportsmanship.

attributes.name: Mental Health & Wellbeing
attributes.description: “Just because no one else can heal or do your inner work for you, doesn’t mean you can, should, or need to do it alone” – Lisa Olivera. Welcome to your go-to hub for all things mental health.

attributes.name: Philosophy
attributes.description: Philosophy gets to the heart of knowledge, reality and existence. It helps develop critical-thinking skills and gives us a basis for decision-making around difficult ethical decisions. Explore knowledge for all for good.

attributes.name: TV & Radio
attributes.description: TV and radio is a world of endless stories and entertainment. It’s a powerful tool for personal expression and changing lives. Podcasters, presenters, and radio personalities unite and become a force for good.

attributes.name: Healthcare
attributes.description: Free, evidence-based resources for healthcare workers. All backed by contributions from leading doctors, nurses, and researchers.

attributes.name: Social Media
attributes.description: Explore the dynamic social media landscape. Analyze trends, platforms, and their societal impact. Your guide to understanding the ever-evolving digital connections shaping today's world.

attributes.name: Black Voices
attributes.description: Connect, exchange opinions and ideas, and learn from experts such as historians, professors, and anti-racist activists about black lives. Dive into culture, history, and news right here.

attributes.name: Travel
attributes.description: A space to check out the many wonders of the world. Get inspiration for this summer’s holiday or your next home, or just find the perfect lockscreen among the many stunning photographs.

attributes.name: Photography
attributes.description: Portrait, landscape, long exposure, macro, our photography community is here for it all. Share the art, application, and practice of creating durable images by recording light with professionals and amateurs.

attributes.name: LGBTQ+
attributes.description: No discrimination here. Drop into the LGBTQ+ community, feel seen, be heard, and empower each other in the fight for acceptance and equality.

attributes.name: Movies
attributes.description: Escape the world awhile in a great movie, then talk about it here. Make recommendations from romance to horror and from thriller to drama. What’s Oscar-worthy and what’s not? Drop your blockbuster views here.

attributes.name: Programming
attributes.description: Unlock the realm of programming. From writing code to building algorithms, dive into the world of logical creativity. Your launchpad for turning ideas into functional reality.

attributes.name: Weather
attributes.description: Weather can make your day or wash out your plans. And apps can miss the mark. So get real-time, on-the-ground updates from whoever’s where you plan to be. All things weather, for all regions.

attributes.name: Poverty & Inequality
attributes.description: How do we eliminate poverty and inequality? Education, clean water, nutrition, and healthcare are just the start. Help us advocate, educate, and organise for system change and a more just and equitable world.

attributes.name: Science
attributes.description: Connect, build bridges, and discuss the latest developments across all scientific disciplines. Advance human knowledge, and let curiosity and learning thrive.

attributes.name: Energy & Pollution
attributes.description: How do we reach net-zero? The energy transition is at the heart of environmental discourse and the sector is one of the leading contributors to harmful emissions in our air. Dig into collective knowledge, ask questions, and fight for a cleaner future.

attributes.name: Environment
attributes.description: Climate change hasn’t slowed down, and we also need to address the air we breathe, the quality of the Earth’s water, and the survival of the plants and animals around us that form the delicate yet crucial ecosystem that keeps the world alive and kicking. There’s no Planet B.

attributes.name: Law & Justice
attributes.description: We live in conflict-ridden times and our need for justice is greater than ever. Drop in here to debate human rights, prison reform, and more, among legal eagles, academics, and armchair QCs.

attributes.name: Humanities
attributes.description: Get close to the core of the human condition. The humanities community wades deep into classics, literature, history, and more to offer equal access to knowledge to all.

attributes.name: Music
attributes.description: “Where words fail, music speaks” – Hans Christian Andersen. We unite musicians and music fans to share their talent and passions in a community that spreads both joy and important, meaningful messages.
